item.name: Get Mapping definition for Parks index
Elastic: create mapping for Parks index
Elastic: bulk put set of Parks documents
Query for all parks - sorted on world heritage site and number of visitors

request.description: Match all national parks, sort them by world heritage site (the parks thart are one come fist) and subsequently by number of visitors. Only return a limited number of properties. Return 40 records.

item.name: Query Parks - in a state whose name starts with M
Query Parks - sort for distance from New York
Query and Filter Parks - that ideally contain Mountain and are a World Heritage Site for sure
Query Parks by description  with as much largest and mountain as possible -  with query execution explanation
Query Parks - fuzzy, proximity - with query execution explanation

request.description: Search for parks who have the string "mountaon" in their description - or something that is close to it (our fuzziness allows for up to two character edits distance); we also require (note how the default-operator is explicitly set to AND) the number of visitors to be under 1 Million and they are not located in Alaska.
